subject: Re: [cc-devel] Exempi, namespaces
body:
Hubert Figuiere wrote:

> Looks like I'll do a 1.99.1 for you :-)
> I'll also add the const for the CC namespace (the one that Mike mentionned)
> 
> And I'll catch the exceptions more. They shouldn't even be propogated
> out of the library.

Exempi 1.99.1 is now available. (released last night)

http://libopenraw.freedesktop.org/download/exempi-1.99.1.tar.gz

I have to announce it, but feel free to try it out.


Hub
